author: AlessandroTarabini
body:
#### PR description:
We would like to increase the precision (from 8 to 10) of two shower shape observables for Hgg analyses (**pfChargedIso** and **hoe**) due to the observation of _spikes_ in the distributions [[slide10](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1451207/contributions/6234981/attachments/2969552/5225661/Flow_2023_Hgg_18_11.pdf)]. This issue was already noticed in the past for other observables, which led to the decision to increase the precision of these floats to 10 [[merged PR](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43253)] 

#### PR validation:
The change is trivial

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
This change should be included in NanoAODv15, so it should be back ported to the corresponding CMSSW version
title: Increase precision of two shower shape observables for Hgg analysis
